engaged.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if two people are engaged, they have agreed to marry
engaged.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Have you heard? Sally and Ray are getting engaged.
She is engaged to be married.
engaged.translation[0].definitions[0].no: You are or get engaged to someone
He is engaged to a lovely woman
He is engaged with a lovely woman
engaged.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you call someone on the telephone and their line is engaged, they are already speaking to someone else
engaged.translation[0].definitions[1].no: engaged tone/signal (=the sound you hear when the phone is engaged)
engaged.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She rang Mrs Tavett but the line was engaged.
engaged.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a public toilet that is engaged is being used
engaged.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a telephone that is engaged is being used
engaged.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: I can’t get through — her line’s engaged.
Every time I call I get the engaged tone (=the sound you hear when the telephone is engaged).
